product_name: SP Gadgets POV Camera Dive Buoy
long_description: The multipurpose SP Gadgets POV Camera Dive Buoy offers control when filming and keeps your GoPro cam afloat if you drop it. Fill the handle with water to create neutral buoyancy when scuba diving.
short_description: The multipurpose SP Gadgets POV Camera Dive Buoy offers control when filming and keeps your GoPro cam afloat if you drop it. Fill the handle with water to create neutral buoyancy when scuba diving.
